metadata.name: invertmeeg Leaderboard
metadata.description: Official leaderboard run using biosemi32/ico2 with 50 samples per dataset across all solver categories.

focal_source.name: Focal Source
focal_source.description: Single focal dipole source with moderate noise

multi_source.name: Multi Source
multi_source.description: Multiple focal dipole sources with low-to-moderate noise

extended_source.name: Extended Source
extended_source.description: Multiple extended patch sources with spatial smoothing

noisy.name: Noisy
noisy.description: Variable sources under challenging low-SNR conditions
